headline: flash freeze warning in effect
description:
Temperatures are forecast to fall rapidly. Ponding water, slush, and any falling precipitation will freeze as the temperature drops.

What:
Flash freeze 

When:
This morning or near midday.

Additional information:
Icy and slippery conditions are expected to develop as temperatures rapidly fall below the freezing mark.

###

Surfaces such as highways, roads, walkways and parking lots will become icy, slippery and hazardous.

Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to ONstorm@ec.gc.ca or post reports on X using #ONStorm.
instruction: Take extra care when walking or driving in affected areas. Be prepared to adjust your driving with changing road conditions.

affected_areas.area_description: Deep River - Whitney - Eastern Algonquin Park
Western Algonquin Park - Lake of Two Rivers
Town of Parry Sound - Rosseau - Killbear Park
Oxtongue Lake - Fort Irwin - Northern Haliburton County
Fenelon Falls - Balsam Lake Park - Northern Kawartha Lakes
Peterborough City - Lakefield - Southern Peterborough County
